site.description: This Feature contains the components of the SCULPT Validation Engine. These include: Sculpt Editor, Tabular CSV viewer, CSV parser.

category-def.name: Chisel
category-def.label: Chisel
category-def.description:
This Eclipse Plugins contains the components of the Chisel Validation and Transformation Engine. These include, but are not limited to the Sculpt Schema Editor/Validator/Debuger and the CSV Transformer.
